data.name: Clean Energy Home Loan Package Fixed
data.description: The Clean Energy Home Loan is about rewarding customers who do the right thing for our planet. With the certainty of a fixed rate

bundles.name: Clean Energy home loan
bundles.description: Clean Energy Home loans include an annual fee waiver for the platinum credit card, everyday banking, no establishment fee for personal loans, and up to a 10% discount on insurance for eligible customers.

features.additionalInfo: You can self-serve your day-to-day banking needs via Bank Australia's App, Internet Banking or Phone Banking.

A Mortgage Offset account reduces the amount of interest you pay on your home loan. The amount within this account is offset against your home loan, meaning you only pay interest on the difference. Up to a limit of $20,000.
Make your loan repayments weekly, fortnightly or monthly

Welcoming a new family member to the family can place a pretty big strain on finances so we offer you the option of pausing your home loan repayments to give you some breathing space.  This allows you to take a break from payments for three months, or halve them for six. Conditions apply

Our Eco-Pause lets customers take a break from their mortgage repayments and redirect their money to eco upgrades such as solar panels, batteries and water tanks. With an eco-pause you can pause your repayments for three months or halve them for six. Conditions apply.
We protect an equivalent amount of land on the Bank Australia Conservation Reserve as is being constructed to help offset the environmental impact of land clearing

eligibility.additionalInfo: Individuals (natural persons) must have the legal capacity to enter into the loan contract, provide acceptable identification documentation and be 18 years or older.
Australian citizen or permanent resident of Australia
Applications for loans are subject to the Bank's lending criteria.
Eligibility for the Clean Energy Home Loan discount is subject to the Bank's Energy Efficiency Criteria. Conditions apply.

fees.name: Additional Valuation
fees.additionalInfo: The establishment fee covers a standard loan, which includes one valuation. This fee applies for any additional standard residential valuation required.

fees.name: Break Fee
fees.additionalInfo: You may be required to pay a break fee if you pay your fixed loan off in full, make an early repayment or make certain other changes to your loan during any fixed period. The fee is calculated at the time of the event and is specifically related to your individual loan. More information is found in the loan fees and charges document.

fees.name: Loan Package Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Annual fee payable on all Premium loans. The fee is debited to the loan annually on the anniversary date of funding and is non refundable. Only one annual package fee applies per customer where multiple package loans exist

fees.name: Mortgage Discharge Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you request Bank Australia to arrange for the registration of discharge or Bank Australia is required to attend settlement. It covers preparation of the discharge of mortgage form. Statutory government registration fees will still apply.  Additional fees may apply and should be paid direct to our agent if settlement is requested in a location other than a Bank Australia office.

fees.name: Portability Fee- Existing Mortgage
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when a property securing a loan is replaced with a property that is already registered with a Bank Australia mortgage.

fees.name: Portability Fee- New Mortgage
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you request that a property securing a loan is replaced with a property that is a new security to Bank Australia.

fees.name: Valuation Administration Fee
fees.additionalInfo: If you request a loan variation, Bank Australia may need to revalue your property before approving the request.

lendingRates.additionalInfo: Owner Occupied with Principal and Interest repayment type.
Owner Occupied with Principal and Interest repayment type.
